channel.description: Recent content in cloud on Mark Needham

item.title: Dave Thomas on Cloud Computing
item.description: I went to see Object Mentor’s Dave Thomas give a talk about cloud computing on Tuesday evening in a combined meeting of the Sydney Alt.NET user group and several others. I’d not seen him speak before but several colleagues had seen him at JAOO earlier this year so he came highly recommended. We started off with a plug for the JAOO Australia 2009 conference which will again be in Brisbane and Sydney at the beginning of May.
